text: “obaṭa biya ganvā anaguru æn̆gavīma piṇisa obagen keneku kerehi obagē deviyan vetin oba venuven hon̆da ovadan pæmiṇīma gænada oba puduma vannē? nuhgē janatāvagen pasu ohu obava (bhumiyehi adhipatīn bavaṭa pat kara, dēhayenda, śaktiyenda (an ayaṭa vaḍā) obaṭa adhika vaśayenma labā dīma gænada sitā balanu. allāhgē mema varaprasādayan siyalla oba sitā balanu. (eyin) oba jayagrahaṇaya kaḷa hækiya” (yayi pævasuvēya)
